named-query.name: EventSchedule.findByExhibitionCode
named-query.query: select o from EventSchedule o where o.exhibition.code=?1 order by dateFrom, dateTo

named-query.name: Exhibitor.findByExhibitionCode
named-query.query: select o from Exhibitor o where o.exhibition.code=?1 order by name

named-query.name: Speaker.findByExhibitionCode
named-query.query: select o from Speaker o where o.exhibition.code=?1 order by name
